channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 04:53 Driven anxiety in Pavlograd District.Creck on further reports.

item.title: 游리 04:08 Fragrant anxiety in Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lajpetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 04:08 Fragrant anxiety in Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lajpetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
